## Other Requirements and Recommendations
- Calculator: scientific only (you can use [desmos.com/scientific](https://desmos.com/scientific)
- Bring a device to class that can connect to the internet (phone, tablet, laptop, etc).
- Textbook & online homework system are FREE!
  - You can purchase a hard copy of the text if you really want to [here](https://www.lulu.com/shop/-stitz-zeager-and-openstax-and-katherine-cliff/trigonometry/paperback/product-r9wpvn.html?page=1&pageSize=4). 
- Materials recommendations:
	- 1 notebook for notes, 1 notebook for homework
